blog.name: kingronw

An account dedicated to our lord and saviour Ronald Bilius Weasley

tracking #kingronw

summary: okay so just out of curiosity I’m trying to see if I can lessen my hate for Draco Malfoy using canon and canon only. can people...
body: okay so just out of curiosity I’m trying to see if I can lessen my hate for Draco Malfoy using canon and canon only. can people either tag accs who sympathise with Draco as a result of evidence from the text or inbox me stuff themselves about things that have happened in the books/excerpts from the text that represent him in a more positive light, or make him appear less like a solely bullying piece of garbage? because I refuse to believe people stan this guy simply as a result of fanon/headcanons?? oh and I’m actually being legit btw this isn’t a shitpost lmao

summary: Gwendolyn’s animagic form is Thunderbird. She likes it and does not like it at the same time: it’s very noticeable. For this...
caption: Gwendolyn’s animagic form is Thunderbird. She likes it and does not like it at the same time: it’s very noticeable. For this reason, Gwendolyn is an unregistered animagus. But of course uses this form 🕊

blog.name: wayofdreams
blog.title: Valentine Cuny-Le Callet
blog.description: • Gribouillages et coquecigrues d'une créature qui étudie paraît-il aux Arts Décoratifs. Des dessins, des photos et des céphalopages un peu partout. • Drawings and absurdities of a creature studying Print Media in ENSAD Paris. Drawings, photos and freaks everywhere.

summary: Je suis heureuse/ fière/ supercalifragilisticexpialidocieuse d'annoncer la sortie en Octobre prochain de l’encyclopédie “Le...
caption:
Je suis heureuse/ fière/ supercalifragilisticexpialidocieuse d'annoncer la sortie en Octobre prochain de l’encyclopédie “Le Monde Antique de Harry Potter”, écrite par Blandine Le Callet, publiée chez Stock… et illustrée par mes soins.

I am happy/ proud/ supercalifragilisticexpialidocious to announce the publication next October of the encyclopedia “Le Monde Antique de Harry Potter”, written by Blandine Le Callet, published by Stock… and illustrated by your humble servant (me)

body:
LISTEN UP Y'ALL

OK BUT WHAT IF ONE OF THE REASONS DUMBLEDORE WANTED HARRY TO STAY WITH HIS UNCLE AND AUNT BECAUSE THEY ARE SHITTY PEOPLE. I mean he knew how bad they would treat him and even McGonagall told him that they are the worst kind of muggles. He still didn’t change his mind. What if it’s because he wanted him to grow up in a bad environment so that when he joins hogwarts he will be saved. Harry would fight till death since he owes hogwarts and the Wizarding world his life because they are the he has friends now and is away from his relatives. Dumbledore wanted him to grow up away from the fame because of this. If he grew up famous he might become another Gilderoy Lockhart or cower away from the battle. After all, he did raise him as a pig to be slaughtered.

blog.description: (I don't actually read all these fics or choose what comes on the blog, it's literally just a feed of the ao3 ship tag sorry)

title: just tired, you know?
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2ufIFJr

by ghostieboyo

It’s the thirty-first of October, 1981 and Lily and James Potter are dead.

Sirius is locked away, Remus is too in his own right, and Harry’s been growing up without them.

Words: 3350, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Major Character Death
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Sirius Black, Remus Lupin, Harry Potter, Hermione Granger, Ron Weasley
  • Relationships: Sirius Black/Remus Lupin
  • Additional Tags: the major character death is canon tho its james and lily, this is NOT canon compliant, its happy i swear, sirius and remus adopt harry, its very good and gay, sirius makes eggs, everyone is kinda sad but thats life, Trans Harry Potter, i made all the main trio trans i do what i want, writing this felt like healing i hope it comes off that way


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2ufIFJr

blog.name: maraudertexts
blog.title: Marauders Era Texts
blog.description: A bunch of texts, facebook posts and whatsapp messages keep getting screenshotted and put online for the world to see.

summary: Antonin, you know how Reg and Barty got unstuck last night? Yeah, well, Barty admitted he might fancy you. Give it some time,...
question: Antonin, you know how Reg and Barty got unstuck last night? Yeah, well, Barty admitted he might fancy you. Give it some time, and he’ll be sure. Just try not to be as agitated with him, because you know it can grow to something bigger if you let it.
answer:
Antonin: He said that?

Antonin: *Smiles and then quickly stops*

Antonin: Well, whatever.

reblog.comment:
Antonin: He said that?

Antonin: *Smiles and then quickly stops*

Antonin: Well, whatever.

trail.content_raw:
Antonin: He said that?

Antonin: *Smiles and then quickly stops*

Antonin: Well, whatever.
trail.content:
Antonin: He said that?

Antonin: *Smiles and then quickly stops*

Antonin: Well, whatever.

blog.name: hogwartshousefriends
blog.title: Hogwarts House Friends
blog.description: Greetings babes. I’m Anastasia. I have a special place in my heart for both Shakespeare and Harry Potter. Icon by @risuniku. If you need something tagged that I don't already tag let me know and I will do so.

summary:
Hufflepuff: Do you like Disney?
Ravenclaw: Of course.
Hufflepuff: I was just talking with Gryff and they don’t like...
body:
Hufflepuff: Do you like Disney?

Ravenclaw: Of course.

Hufflepuff: I was just talking with Gryff and they don’t like Disney.

Ravenclaw: Is that even legal? Doesn’t Disney’s team of expertly trained hitmen come and take you out if you ever speak badly of Disney?

Hufflepuff: R.I.P. Gryffindor.

by noowanda

1972. Someone has a secret. Someone is on the run. Someone is in love. Someone is lying.

(Marauders AU. The Marauders + Lily are freshmen in college and have all been accepted into Oxford University.)

Words: 1186, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: F/M, M/M
  • Characters: Sirius Black, Remus Lupin, James Potter, Lily Evans, Peter Pettigrew, Marlene McKinnon, Hope Lupin, Lyall Lupin, Euphemia Potter, Fleamont Potter, i’m sure various others will be making appearances
  • Relationships: Sirius Black/Remus Lupin, James Potter/Lily Evans
  • Additional Tags: Alternate Universe - College/University, Alternate Universe - Canon Divergence, so ok hear me out, they’re not wizards, but i’m working on the parallels to the books and i’m rlly liking how it’s turning out so far, wolfstar, Wolfstar AU, jily, jily au, this will be a primarily wolfstar fic but you never know what will happen tbh


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2uq2uwN

  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: F/M, M/M
  • Characters: Sirius Black, Remus Lupin, James Potter, Lily Evans, Peter Pettigrew, Marlene McKinnon, Hope Lupin, Lyall Lupin, Euphemia Potter, Fleamont Potter, i’m sure various others will be making appearances
  • Relationships: Sirius Black/Remus Lupin, James Potter/Lily Evans
  • Additional Tags: Alternate Universe - College/University, Alternate Universe - Canon Divergence, so ok hear me out, they’re not wizards, but i’m working on the parallels to the books and i’m rlly liking how it’s turning out so far, wolfstar, Wolfstar AU, jily, jily au, this will be a primarily wolfstar fic but you never know what will happen tbh


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2uq2uwN

summary:
THIS IS THE NIGHT

 TITN is a post-potter roleplay set in 2029 amidst a looming financial crisis with a distinct shift into...
caption:
THIS IS THE NIGHT

TITN is a post-potter roleplay set in 2029 amidst a looming financial crisis with a distinct shift into televised entertainment. 

We’ve been around for 3 years and are always searching for new friends to write with. We are hoping to fill up our canon list, so please stop on by, and let us know if you have any questions!

title: Flirtations
body:
Prompt:  Just this once
Fandom: Harry Potter
Characters: Lily Evans, James Potter
Setting: Historical (Regency) AU; Sequel to my one shot Evening at Almack’s
714 Words

Lily was most grateful for Lord Peverell’s interruption.

Had he not arrived and cut into her argument with Snape, she would have made a very unladylike spectacle of herself.  

The insinuations of Snape’s earlier insult still made her seethe.

Lily’s fingers twitched, resting lightly on Lord Peverell’s arm.

“I must confess my curiosity’s greatly stirred,” Lord Peverell intoned, jolting Lily out of her thoughts. “Of course, as a gentleman, I shall no pry into whatever was the root of your disagreement with Snape.”

“Thank you, my lord. I appreciate that,” Lily replied, relaxing a little.

“Although, If you do wish to tell me, I will listen and console you to the best of my ability.”

The corners of Lily’s lips twitched. “That is exceedingly kind of you, my lord. I do not wish to dwell on the matter a moment longer, however.”

Lord Peverell grinned. “Excellent. You definitely should not dwell on it, ever. Snape is not worthy of your regard, Miss Evans.”

The elusive smile blossomed at last. “On that, I agree.”

The dance was about to begin and Lily and Lord Peverell hastened to take their places in the two long rows.

The strings started slow, testing the chords of the song.

James bowed his head. Lily made a modest curtsy.

Their gazes met, for a brief moment, before the song picked up and the dance began.

They stepped towards each other, met in the middle and clasped hands. They spun a slow circle. He was standing so close their shoulders nearly brushed.

And so it went, through the slow steps and the livelier ones.

Every time they clasped hands, Lily found James’ hand warm and his grip firm.

The touches were much too fleeting; she enjoyed the feel of his large hand enveloping hers.  

He moved with more grace than she did. Doubtless, he’d had much more practice at dancing in the famed balls at the Almack’s.

Given his figure, Lily also suspected he was of an athletic nature – not that she had let her gaze rest overlong on the broad shoulders or the defined muscles the knee-breeches did little to hide.

In the end, Lily was pleased to have made it through the dance without stumbling or tripping over her feet.

After the dance, Lord Peverell led her away, towards a quiet corner.

Lily’s eyebrows rose.

She had believed he had only cut in to play the hero and rescue her from Snape’s – literal – clutches. Surely now that the dance had ended, so had his heroic role as well?

Lily certainly had expected him to go and seek some new entertainment after that final bow.

But here he was, with no apparent hurry to leave her side.

All of a sudden, Lily was aware of the glances cast in their way.  

As they settled to a near-deserted corner, Lily took out her fan and hid behind it.

“Have care, my lord, how much interest you pay me tonight,” she warned him.

Snape’s insult still fresh on her mind, her lips drew into a sneer. “Else the others here will think a Peerless woman is reaching above her station and trying to trap you into an ill-suited match.”

Lord Peverell laughed away her concerns and turned to look at her.

“Overall, Miss Evans, I care very little about what other people will think. As for your station, I care nothing of that either – I’m to be the tenth Duke of Peverell, after all. I have Peer enough for the both of us and I shall pay you as much interest as I like!”

His hazel eyes flashed and the corner of his mouth gave a little quirk. “Besides, I assure you I would be happily trapped in whatever nefarious designs you might have on my person, Miss Evans.”

“Lord Peverell, that is most improper,” Lily admonished him – though she imagined the effect would have been better if she were not smiling.

Her cheeks were flushed as well and her heart was aflutter in her chest.

Before this, the comments he had made and the attention he had given her could have been written off as simple courtesy.

But that last remark had been blatant; that look in his eyes had left nothing to doubt.

Duke Peverell’s heir was flirting with Lily.

blog.name: tazangelofdeath
blog.title: New in town
blog.description:
I'm a fully realized creation!
Background art by defenestratin

body:
Neville, Magic, and PTSD

So, up late rambles have me wondering if Neville Longbottom had such late accidental magic as a child because he was traumazied? Like the fact that he saw his parents be tortured into insanity (I remember hearing that but at the very least he lost his parents which is traumatic within itself) gave him PTSD and his magic withdrew. It only really reactivated or just showed itself to save his life when his uncle Algie dropped him out the window.
